subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: To hear players, managers and soccer writers on both sides tell it, the 28th game in the series is a matter of history, whether the aging English squad can beat a young German team on Sunday.
snippet: To hear players, managers and soccer writers on both sides tell it, the 28th game in the series is a matter of history, whether the aging English squad can beat a young German team on Sunday.
